summary:
Full retexture of both Nightingale weapons, bow and sword. Also included new nightingale arrows (Textures in 2048x2048, longer shaft and steel look arrow head.)
-Carbon Fiber Style!!
-Double resolution (1024x1024).
-Carbon fiber style.
-A bit desaturated (less blue) metal.
-Added some more details to it.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b][size=4][center]As all my mods, it's FREE and NEXUS-EXCLUSIVE, if you see it on Steam it's stolen.[/center][/size][/b][/u]
Full retexture of both Nightingale weapons(bow and sword), also adds Nightingale arrows to the game:

Nightingale Retex:
-Double resolution (1024x1024).
-Carbon fiber style.
-A bit desaturated (less blue) metal.
-Added some more details to it.
-Improved normal and specular maps.

Nightingale Arrows:
-HD textures, 2048x2048 with new normal and specular maps.
-They can be crafted in a forge:
==>Steel ingot + ebony ingot + 2 hagraven feathers = 15 nightingale arrows
-You will get 25 nightingale arrows with nightingale bow in the quest.
-Fixed arrow length (get http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5164 to fix that in vanilla arrows)


------------------------
Instalation:
-----------------------

1./ Copy the content in that folder into your Data folder (usually: program files/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data)
2./ Overwrite if prompted

--------------------------
Uninstallation:
---------------------------
Just delete everything you copied:
- Data/Textures/Weapons/nightingale
- Data/Meshes/weapons/nightingale
- Data/NightingaleArrows.esp

-------------------------------------------
GET [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28899/]Nightingale Prime HD [/url]!!!!!!
---------------------------------------

Enjoy playing skyrim and if you like my retexture: please, come back and endorse. Thanks in advance.
author: FrankFamily
